original_text: I set out during the night with a few others. I had not told anyone what my God had put in my heart to do for Jerusalem. There were no mounts with me except the one I was riding on.
korean_text: 내 하나님께서 예루살렘을 위해 무엇을 할 것인지 내 마음에 주신 것을 내가 아무에게도 말하지 아니하고 밤에 일어나 몇몇 사람과 함께 나갈새 내가 탄 짐승 외에는 다른 짐승이 없더라

sentences.original_text: I set out during the night
what my God had put in my heart
sentences.korean_translation: 내 하나님께서 내 마음에 두신 것을

sentences.original_text: There were no mounts with me
except the one I was riding on
sentences.korean_translation: 내가 타고 있던 한 마리를 제외하고는
